attributes.action: Stop Foreign Drivers Killing British Residents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the news this morning, Sunday 19th April, two more British Residents have been murdered by a Polish man driving the WRONG way up a motorway. Prime Minister, I ask you along with the undersigned to bring in some form of legislation to protect the British from the menance of some foreign drivers. Enforce some form of condensed driving examination. Give out free copies of the Highway Code on ferries. Something needs to be done

rejection.details: Your title is provocative, please reword it to avoid causing offence and also in such a way that it makes a clear request to the PM about what you want to change.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
